mapper.select: select * from js_question where id not in (SELECT question_id from js_completed where user_id = #{userId}) and status = 0 ORDER BY RAND() limit 1
SELECT a.create_date createTime, q.`name` name, q.score score from js_answer a LEFT JOIN js_question q on q.id = a.question_id where a.user_id = #{userId} order by createTime desc

select q.name, q.score,q.id, c.num from js_question q LEFT join (SELECT question_id, count(*) as num from js_completed GROUP BY question_id) c on q.id = c.question_id where q.id not in (SELECT question_id from js_completed where user_id = #{userId}) and q.score >= #{low} and q.score <= #{high}
SELECT * from js_question ORDER BY create_date desc
select q.*,r.count from js_question q left join (SELECT c.question_id,COUNT(1) count from js_completed c GROUP BY question_id) r on q.id = r.question_id ORDER BY r.count desc

select q.name name, q.score score,q.id, c.count count from js_question q LEFT join (SELECT question_id, count(*) as count from js_completed GROUP BY question_id) c on q.id = c.question_id where q.id not in (SELECT question_id from js_completed where user_id = #{QuestionSearchRes.userId})
and q.score >= #{QuestionSearchRes.lowRank}
and q.score <= #{QuestionSearchRes.highRank}
AND q.name like concat('%', #{QuestionSearchRes.name}, '%')
order by count desc
order by score desc
,score desc
